5edfb2c9-7974-450a-bc67-6681eb888bc3.description: Drawing on the expertise of Oxford faculty and industry leaders, the Oxford Blockchain Strategy Programme provides an understanding of this transformative technology, covering cryptocurrencies and various types of blockchain protocols and networks. Participants will explore what a blockchain is, how it works, and its applications - from digital assets to intergalactic communications - and learn frameworks and methodologies to develop and deploy business models built around this new technology.
5edfb2c9-7974-450a-bc67-6681eb888bc3.name: Oxford Blockchain Strategy Programme

54bdd978-eb5a-4189-87db-ff7e3b1d3a4f.description: Learners who complete the online Oxford Fintech Programme will gain the knowledge and insight required to understand the latest developments in fintech and their impact on the more than $20 trillion global financial services industry, including gaining knowledge of recent and on-going changes in multiple domains within financial services, learning frameworks to help build a strategy for new fintech ventures, and learning how to tackle new regulations and digital disruption in financial services.
54bdd978-eb5a-4189-87db-ff7e3b1d3a4f.name: Oxford Fintech Programme

e2725e5f-55d8-4edf-b5bf-95d4b283595b.description: Big data powered by AI is dramatically reshaping the global financial services industry, and Open Banking promises to transform it further still. As Open Banking expands across the globe, the unleashing of data will open up new market opportunities with the potential to radically transform the industry, creating new winners, losers, rewards and challenges.
e2725e5f-55d8-4edf-b5bf-95d4b283595b.name: Oxford AI in Fintech and Open Banking Programme

3de30ead-ff5f-4393-b561-783ebfa3c3a1.description: Looking at industry-specific use cases of disruptive platforms, AI and blockchain, participants will gain critical knowledge of what differentiates between successful digital transformation, why some transformation efforts fail, and adopt the tools to drive digital transformation in business.

e1b1da30-da1e-42dc-a66e-3fd50c51e4d9.description: To ensure their place in the future of work, business leaders across financial services industries will need to keep pace with rapidly evolving updates in AI, Open Banking, blockchain, cryptocurrency, and cyber security subsectors. To complete the Series, learners must take the core Oxford Fintech Programme, as well as two of four related elective programmes. For Technologists, these electives are AI in Fintech and Open Banking, and Blockchain Strategy.
e1b1da30-da1e-42dc-a66e-3fd50c51e4d9.name: Oxford Digital Finance Executive Series for Technologists

This Executive Series from Saïd Business School, University of Oxford is the quickest and most comprehensive way to learn the actionable skills and strategic frameworks needed to be a fintech entrepreneur and lead digital disruption in financial services.

a8b1633b-80d5-460f-98b3-508aeaa3e8ff.description: Opportunities in digital finance have never been greater – but only if you’re staying ahead of disruption. This Executive Series is the quickest and most comprehensive way to learn how to drive innovation and lead change in the financial services industry.
